aka: Kid Detectives and the Secret of the White Lady

director.name: 瑞尼·维里贝尔 René Vilbre

this_title: Väikelinna detektiivid ja valge daami saladus
trans_title: Kid Detectives and the Secret of the White Lady
introduction: In a quiet resort town Haapsalu four kids are spending their summer holidays together. Suddenly they are dragged into events that started in the 15th century in the local bishop's stronghold. The children must solve a difficult mystery of a clock robbery and they have to find a treasure that has been lost for centuries and contains a formula of making gold.
foreign_title: Väikelinna detektiivid ja valge daami saladus
